{{cpp/io/c/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}

{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|
int vwscanf( const wchar_t* format, std::va_list vlist );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|

}}

Reads data from the a variety of sources, interprets it according to {{c|format}} and stores the results into locations defined by {{c|vlist}}.

@1@ Reads the data from {{lc|stdin}}.
@2@ Reads the data from file stream {{c|stream}}.
@3@ Reads the data from null-terminated wide string {{c|buffer}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|stream|input file stream to read from}}
{{par|buffer|pointer to a null-terminated wide string to read from}}
{{par|format|pointer to a null-terminated wide string specifying how to read the input}}
{{par|vlist|variable argument list containing the receiving arguments.}}
{{par end}}


{{cpp/io/c/scanf format|wcs=true}}

===Return value===
Number of arguments successfully read, or {{lc|EOF}} if failure occurs.
